about_the_game:
If you purchase this DLC, you will be able to obtain all the "normal accessories (449 types in total)" that can be used in the sumo wrestler creation function, and you will also be able to obtain "special accessories (27 types in total) exclusively for DLC" in the game. Become.
This DLC is recommended for those who want to enjoy the sumo wrestler creation function immediately.
* "Normal accessories" other than "Special accessories for DLC" can also be obtained by accumulating in-game currency.

This DLC is recommended for those who want to enjoy the sumo wrestler creation function immediately.
* "Normal accessories" other than "Special accessories for DLC" can also be obtained by accumulating in-game currency.

  • OS: Windows 10 64bit

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
